Articles.Content: Well there are a few mods like KW that add 5 Meter parts... I kinda think that 10 Meter Crafts would be way to big.
I'm all for 10 meter parts as well, especially when it can reduce my part count.

Well, I'm new to modeling. I can sure as hell make huge parts!!!!

But stockalike? I dont know ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Well I guess 10 M station would be cool but imagine the wing size for a 10m plane ^^
I would like it for launching the largest Near Future Liquid Hydrogen spheres into orbit. They don't fit inside any of the other farings.
If you want large parts but dont want to use specific mods you can get TweakScale which will let you change part sizes. I'm not sure how large you can make parts with that though.
Thank You Guys So Much! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I Will Look Into All These Awesome Mods Tomorrow...
